snippet.title: '83 - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
‘83 is a Cold-War-Gone-Hot, combined arms, first-person military shooter for high player counts (80+) now being developed by Blue Dot Games. 

The game pits two large platoons of players against each other in massive maps, fighting over a number of objectives that have a tangible impact on the battle as a whole when held by the victorious faction.

Players will have access to a selection of real-world infantry weapons and equipment, as well as a selection of powerful land and air vehicles which can decisively turn the tide of a battle.

Defend your future at http://www.83thegame.com

Contact us at:

Discord - https://discord.gg/JhpgysJuex
Reddit - http://www.reddit.com/r/83thegame
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/83TheGame/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/83thegame

'83 © Blue Dot Games Ltd. Unreal® is a registered trademark of Epic Games Inc. Unreal® Engine, copyright 1988-2024. Selected archive footage used attributed to the Reagan Library, Scarakus, Michael Buckley and USSR Production. All other rights reserved.
